column1: The Purple Pig////My boyfriend and I got here at around 4:50 pm on a Sunday evening before a Second City Show
column2: and there was no wait. We got seated at the end of a communal table. Our waitress was so friendly
column4: and efficient. She came over and took our drink orders and then answered a couple of questions we had about the menu. We ordered The Pig Platter
column5: the salt and vinegar fried beef tendon chips
